page.title: 17BETTY BLANDINO-COIL POTTERY
page.content: Mrs.Blandino is a professional potter,she makes very delicate coil pots.She has exhibitions in several permanent collections in Britain and abroad.Mrs.Blandino has just come back from Germany where she visited an exhibition where some of her pots were on display. Mrs Blandino began to make coil pots in 1973.Her favourite types of pots are irregular ones.She takes 3_4 days to make a pot.Many of her pots <because they are so thin> change shapes in the kiln ,they look weird but interesting.She doesn't often sell them from her home.However if people enquire she will make pots of their choice Mrs Blandino has written a book about Coiled pottery.When we visited her she showed us how to make a coiled pot.The Princess of Wales asked her a- bout her work at Painswick Craft Fair.
